com.avos.avoscloud

类 AVOSCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avos.avoscloud.AVOSCloud

  • public class AVOSCloud
extends java.lang.Object
    The AVOSCloud class contains static functions that handle global configuration for the AVOSCloud library.

        参数:

        返回:

      • getThreadPoolSize

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(Context context,
              java.lang.String applicationId,
              java.lang.String clientKey)

        Authenticates this client as belonging to your application. This must be called before your application can use the AVOSCloud library. The recommended way is to put a call to AVOSCloud.initialize in each of your onCreate methods. An example: 

                 import android.app.Application;
         import com.avos.avoscloud.AVOSCloud;
 
         public class MyApplication extends Application {
             public void onCreate() {
                 AVOSCloud.initialize(this, "your application id", "your client key");
             }
         }
        参数:
        context - The active Context for your application.
        applicationId - The application id provided in the AVOSCloud dashboard.
        clientKey - The client key provided in the AVOSCloud dashboard.

      • requestSMSCode

        public static void requestSMSCode(java.lang.String phone,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String op,
                  int ttl)
                           throws AVException
        请求发送短信验证码 请在异步任务中调用本方法，或者调用requestSMSCodeInBackgroud(String phone, String name, String op, int ttl, RequestMobileCodeCallback callback)方法 短信示范为: 您正在{name}中进行{op}，您的验证码是:{Code}，请输入完整验证，有效期为:{ttl}
        参数:
        phone - 目标手机号码(必选)
        name - 应用名,值为null 则默认是您的应用名
        op - 验证码的目标操作，值为null,则默认为“短信验证”
        ttl - 验证码过期时间,单位分钟。如果是0，则默认为10分钟
        抛出:
        AVException

      • requestSMSCodeInBackgroud

        @Deprecated
public static void requestSMSCodeInBackgroud(java.lang.String phone,
                                        java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String op,
                                        int ttl,
                                        RequestMobileCodeCallback callback)
        已过时。 

      • requestSMSCodeInBackground

        public static void requestSMSCodeInBackground(java.lang.String phone,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String op,
                              int ttl,
                              RequestMobileCodeCallback callback)
        请求发送短信验证码 短信示范为: 您正在{name}中进行{op}，您的验证码是:{Code}，请输入完整验证，有效期为:{ttl}
        参数:
        phone - 目标手机号码(必选)
        name - 应用名,值为null 则默认是您的应用名
        op - 验证码的目标操作，值为null,则默认为“短信验证”
        ttl - 验证码过期时间,单位分钟。如果是0，则默认为10分钟

      • requestSMSCode

        public static void requestSMSCode(java.lang.String phone,
                  java.lang.String templateName,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> env)
                           throws AVException
        通过短信模板来发送短信验证码 请在异步任务中调用本方法,或者调用 public static void requestSMSCodeInBackground(String phone, String template, Map env, RequestMobileCodeCallback callback)
        参数:

        templateName - 短信模板名称
